metadata.description: For ten years, State Trooper Robert Tower has patrolled mist-enshrouded Silent Hill and never seen its nightmarish, demonic creatures. But now the gun-slinging double-barreled terror known as the Grinning Man has arrived. Horror is unbound and innocents caught in its explosive crossfire. For Tower, it's going to be a HELL of a last day. This volume of horror, inspired by Konami's hit videogame series, is penned by Silent Hill scribe Scott Ciencin and illustrated by Nick Stakal (Hyde, Containment) and features a collaborative cover by Ben Templesmith and Alex Garner.
metadata.name: Silent Hill: The Grinning Man
